snippet.title: The Mayor Of Sanctuary [ Game Boy Color ] indie adventure game compatible with Nintendo GBC #1
snippet.description:
Hi guys,
the sun no longer rises in Sanctuary there must be something wrong. But Yuu will find out for sure.
The Mayor of Sanctuary for the GameBoy Color was brought us by NARA Games. More information here:
www.youtube.com/@UC4ionm-1lvZs7z38sFMQItw 

A physical version of the game is available here:
https://incube8games.com/en-eu/products/the-mayor-of-sanctuary-gbc

Big shout out to Anthony Wallace for making this heartful game.
I really love the mostly peaceful world of Sanctuary. It was me a pleasure!
